system.description: A flat, vertical iron wall springs into being (area up to one 5-ft. square per level). The wall is 1 inch thick per four caster levels; you can double area by halving thickness. Each 5-ft. square has 30 hp per inch of thickness and hardness 10. Optional: create resting on a surface so it can be tipped (DC 40 Str to push); 50% tip either way; Reflex to avoid; 10d6 damage to Large or smaller. Material component: small piece of sheet iron plus 1 lb. gold dust (50 gp).

components.materialDescription: A small piece of sheet iron plus gold dust worth 50 gp (1 pound of gold dust).

system.target: Iron wall whose area is up to one 5-ft. square/level
